full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI RTZA BRGYUD KYI GZHUNG LAS LEN PA 'DI NI SHIN TU BSDUS PA'I PHYIR, DE NAS CHUNG RGYAS NAS BGYI ZHES AER TENI TZAS SANG BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN GYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGO MA CHOG PAR SKYABS GNAS DAM PA DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, BYUNG RGYAL DU SONG BA'I BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA LA, LHAG CHAD LA SOGS PA'I NYES SKYON THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA DANG CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS KYIS THUGS BRTZEBS BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA DES BDAG SOGS 'GRO KUN DENG NAS BYANG CHUB MA THOB KYI BAR DU LAM BZANG GI RKYEN NGAG BAR CHADD KUN BZLOG PA'I GROGS MDZAD PAR GYUR CIG , ,,'GRO BA THAMS CAD DGE BAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
